sourcesContent:
<template>
  Home
</template>

<script>

import {inject, onMounted} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  setup(props){
    onMounted(()=>{
      const mqttClient = inject('mqttClient')

      mqttClient
          .then((client) => {
            client.on('connect', ()=> {
              console.log(client)
              console.log(client.connected)

              client.end()
              console.log(client)
              //subscribe('test')
            })
          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err)
          });

    })

    function subscribe(client, topic) {
      client.subscribe(topic)
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
